rule: The final line must start with the label "General themes:" followed by a list of general overarching themes relevant to the input text content in a comma-separated format.
input: The narrative around health and wellness is evolving.
coverage:
Company names:  
People names:  
Specific topics: health, wellness  
General themes: evolution, narrative change in health and wellness
validityText:
The input given is "The narrative around health and wellness is evolving." This input is a string containing a passage of text. It discusses a theme, specifically "health and wellness," which is relevant to the specification. There are no explicit instructions on length or detail in the input specification, so the simple statement meets the requirement of being a passage of text. It does not violate any rules specified in the input specification. 

OK
